line_1: Keep from commixtures foul and fond,
The Books of which I'm chiefly fond,
line_2: Are such, as You have whilom con'd;

line_1: With Her I liv'd, no Turtles e'er so fond.
line_2: Our Houses met, but more our Souls were join'd.

line_1: All pressing, addressing, caressing, and fond,
line_2: Just the same as those Animals are in a Pond:
